 
CREATE TABLE TestEntitySetName (        
  id                            BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  modificationCounter           INTEGER NOT NULL,
  column_name                   BIGINTNOT NULL,
  column_name_nullable          BIGINT,
  other_identity_name           BIGINT NOT NULL,
  otherEntities                 BIGINT,
  idVisitor                     BIGINT NOT NULL,
  idQueue                       BIGINT NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT PK_TestEntitySetName PRIMARY KEY(id),
  CONSTRAINT FK_Test_other_identity_name FOREIGN KEY(other_identity_name) REFERENCES Other(id),
  CONSTRAINT FK_Test_idVisitor FOREIGN KEY(idVisitor) REFERENCES Visitor(id),
  CONSTRAINT FK_Test_idQueue FOREIGN KEY(idQueue) REFERENCES Queue(id),
);
